name: PUPPYCAT
description:
What happend?

While exploring final cuteness researchers combined a Dog and Cat. But what happened? One body - two heads! 

What kind of silly idiots...

What can be done to help?

Help Puppycat™ escape from the lab. Hurry up and don't get stuck on obstacles. Use the ability of each animal. You know cats can jump high and dogs can bark. You'll figure the rest out yourself ;)

DON'T GET CAUGHT

We hope you enjoy the game! Let us know your personal highscore in the comments!

Controls KeyboardControllerActionALeft Stick (Left)Move Left
DLeft Stick (Right)Move rightWButton SouthJumpQButton WestSwitch Cat / DogSpacebarButton EastInteract Credits
